original_text: It is God who made all things. He also causes all things to continue. And all things are there to show how great he is. We praise him! He is great for ever! Amen. This is true! It is God who made all things. He also causes all things to continue. And all things are there to show how great he is.
korean_text: 이는 만물이 주에게서 나오고 주로 말미암고 주에게로 돌아감이라 그에게 영광이 세세에 있을지어다 아멘

sentences.original_text: It is God who made all things.
He also causes all things to continue.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 또한 모든 것이 계속 존재하게 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: And all things are there to show how great he is.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 것은 그분이 얼마나 위대하신지 보여주기 위해 존재합니다.

sentences.original_text: It is God who made all things.
He also causes all things to continue.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 또한 모든 것이 계속 존재하게 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: And all things are there to show how great he is.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 것은 그분이 얼마나 위대하신지 보여주기 위해 존재합니다.
